We are Triggerise

5 years of making change for good

111 brilliant people strong

10 different mother tongues

1 Olympic gymnast

25 cities we call home

We’re on a mission

### We’re on a mission to trigger millions of positive life choices by young people and make an unsurpassed impact on global health and wellbeing. We’re a global not-for-profit headquartered in Amsterdam. We kicked off with big ambitions in 2014 and now operate in eight markets, with offices and on-the-ground staff around the globe. And we’re not stopping here: our teams and positive impact are expanding by the minute.

We safeguard digital human rights

We always protect user data and never compromise privacy. We only collect user data that is given with consent, and use it to improve our product. We never sell personal information, this includes meta data.
